column1: palta is a Quenya and Telerin verb meaning "feel with the hand
column2: pass the sensitive palm (plata) over a surface: feel with the hand".

column1: From Primitive Elvish paltâ Sundocarmë PAL
palta is a Quenya word meaning "flat of the hand
column2: the hand held upwards or forwards
column3: flat and tensed (with fingers and thumb closed or spread)"

column1: It derives from Primitive Elvish paláta Sundocarmë PAL
